name: Spathi's Flow
body:
**Source** Alec Ellsworth
-
Spathi Anemou grants wind spirits entrance to his wielder's cloak to allow for better utilization of the winds. Spathi believes the best way to learn something is constantly immerse yourself in the subject you are trying to learn. Wind spirits in my pubes were not what I had in mind when I heard "immersion". Though, admittedly, the constant chafing is nearly gone, so that's a plus.
-
Requirements You must be wearing a cloak, wielding Spathi Anemou, there must be air and you can't be encumbered.
-
Immediately gain the following effects:
- You do not trigger traps that use weight or pressure plates as a trigger. 
- Reduce all instances of fall damage by Spathi's level. 
- You are not flat-footed while airborne, even without a fly Speed.
- You have the Quick Jump skill feat. 
- You have a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks made to Jump.
- You have a +5-foot land Speed bonus when using a move action in the direction of the wind.
-
Level 13:
Immediately gain the following additional effects:
- Gain +2 item bonus to Acrobatic checks made to maneuver uneven terrains.
- Your land Speed is unaffected by difficult terrain.
- You now have a +10-foot land Speed bonus when using a move action in the direction of the wind. 

Spiritual Wind Rush (A) Frequency Once a round 
You traverse a strong spiritual wind. Move two times: two Strides, two Steps, or one Stride and one Step (in either order). You can Stride or Step into the air during this movement, moving upward at a 45-degree angle at most; if you end your movement in the air, you fall after taking one action or when your turn ends, whichever comes first. A wall of wind appears in all the spaces you left during this movement, lasting for 1 round.
-
Level 17: 
Immediately gain the following additional effects:
- Gain +2 item bonus to Acrobatic checks made to maneuver kinetic terrains.
- Your land Speed is unaffected by greater difficult terrain. 
- You now have a +15-foot land Speed bonus when using a move action in the direction of the wind. 
- You can now attempt to make Jump actions off of kinetic or airborne objects or creatures. 
- *Spiritual Wind Rush*'s wall of wind now lasts 3 rounds.
-
Level 20: 
Immediately gain the following additional effects:
- Gain +3 item bonus to Acrobatic checks made to maneuver on any terrain, kinetic or airborne objects or creatures. 
- You now have a +20-foot land Speed bonus when using a move action in the direction of the wind. 
- You have a fly Speed equal to your land Speed inheriting any bonuses. 
- *Spiritual Wind Rush*'s wall of wind now lasts 5 rounds.
